nodes.label: Draw a habitat and the different living things in each
Illustration of a forest with trees, deer, robins, fish in stream
Illustration of a pond with lily pads, ducks, frogs, dragonflies, reeds, cattails
Illustration of a garden with flowers, bees, butterflies, earthworms in soil
Correct depiction of diverse plants and animals in forest habitat
Correct depiction of diverse aquatic life and surroundings in pond habitat
Correct depiction of diverse life forms in garden habitat
Potential mislabeling of pond vegetation as reeds and cattails
Verify correct identification of reeds vs cattails
